histogram.name: GoogleUpdate.ErrorHresult
histogram.summary: The HRESULT for a failed on-demand update check.

histogram.name: GoogleUpdate.InfoBar.DeviceFreeSpace
histogram.summary: (Android-only) The amount of internal memory storage that is free on the file system and available to the applications when the InfoBar or update menu item is shown.

histogram.name: GoogleUpdate.Inline.AppUpdateInfo.InstallStatus
histogram.obsolete: Inline updates are deprecated as of M97.
histogram.summary: (Android-only) Records the instances where Play update API returned the current install status of inline updates.

histogram.name: GoogleUpdate.Inline.AppUpdateInfo.UpdateAvailability
histogram.obsolete: Inline updates are deprecated as of M97.
histogram.summary: (Android-only) Records the instances where Play update API returned the current availability of inline updates.

histogram.name: GoogleUpdate.Inline.CallFailure
histogram.obsolete: Inline updates are deprecated as of M97.
histogram.summary: (Android-only) Records the instances where Play update API calls failed.

histogram.name: GoogleUpdate.Inline.StateChange.Error
histogram.obsolete: Inline updates are deprecated as of M97.
histogram.summary: (Android-only) Records the instances where Play update API notified us of an install error during an update. This is keyed on the specific state so we can tell which states are seeing which errors.

histogram.name: GoogleUpdate.Inline.UI.Install.Source
histogram.obsolete: Inline updates are deprecated as of M97.
histogram.summary: (Android-only) The UI component that triggered an inline update to finish and install.

histogram.name: GoogleUpdate.Inline.UI.Retry.Source
histogram.obsolete: Inline updates are deprecated as of M97.
histogram.summary: (Android-only) The UI component that triggered an inline update to retry.

histogram.name: GoogleUpdate.Inline.UI.Start.Source
histogram.obsolete: Inline updates are deprecated as of M97.
histogram.summary: (Android-only) The UI component that triggered an inline update to start.

histogram.name: GoogleUpdate.InstallDetails.UpdateCohort
histogram.summary: Store the hash of update cohort name as reported by Chrome Updater on Windows. Recorded at the start of metrics service.

histogram.name: GoogleUpdate.InstallerExitCode
histogram.summary: The exit code from Chrome's installer following a failed on-demand update check. All values reported for this histogram fall in the GOOGLE_UPDATE_ERROR_UPDATING bucket of the GoogleUpdate.UpdateErrorCode histogram and the GOOPDATEINSTALL_E_INSTALLER_FAILED bucket of the GoogleUpdate.ErrorHresult histogram.

histogram.name: GoogleUpdate.MenuItem.ActionTakenAfterItemClicked
histogram.summary: (Android-only) Records whether Chrome was updated after the update menu item was clicked.

histogram.name: GoogleUpdate.MenuItem.ActionTakenOnMenuOpen
histogram.summary: (Android-only) Records whether the update menu item was clicked when the app menu was opened.

histogram.name: GoogleUpdate.Result.Session
histogram.summary: (Android-only) Whether or not an update was successful when looking at the Chrome version on the next session where there is no update in progress.

histogram.name: GoogleUpdate.Result.TimeWindow
histogram.summary: (Android-only) Whether or not an update was successful within a specific server-configured window of time (e.g. an update may not occur right after the user attempts to start it, but if they update sometime in the next X days, we can possibly attribute it to the update flow we started). An example window value could be on the order of days (e.g. 2 days since an update started).

histogram.name: GoogleUpdate.StartingUpdateState
histogram.summary: (Android-only) Whether or not an update was being tracked as 'in progress' when another update was started.

histogram.name: GoogleUpdate.StartUp.State
histogram.summary: (Android-only) The state of any in-progress updates when the process first starts and queries for it.

histogram.name: GoogleUpdate.UnexpectedState
histogram.summary: An unrecognized CurrentState value received from Google Update while polling for the status of an on-demand update check.

histogram.name: GoogleUpdate.UpdateErrorCode
histogram.summary: The error code for a failed on-demand update check.

histogram.name: GoogleUpdate.UpgradeResult
histogram.summary: The result of an on-demand update check.
